c:capability.name: Somfyv1
c:capability.c:description: Model of a Somfy V1 Blind or Shade.

c:attribute.name: type
c:attribute.description: The user has to set the type of device (Blinds or Shade) they have to generate the proper UI. Defaults to SHADE.

c:attribute.name: reversed
c:attribute.description: The user may need to reverse the shade motor direction if wiring is reversed. Defaults to NORMAL.

c:attribute.name: channel
c:attribute.description: The channel of the Blinds or Shade on the Bridge.

c:attribute.name: currentstate
c:attribute.description: The current state (position) of the Blinds or Shade reported by the bridge.

c:attribute.name: statechanged
c:attribute.description: UTC time of last state (OPEN/CLOSED/FAVORITE) change.

c:method.name: GoToOpen
c:method.description: Move the Blinds or Shade to a pre-programmed OPEN position.

c:method.name: GoToClosed
c:method.description: Move the Blinds or Shade to a pre-programmed CLOSED position.

c:method.name: GoToFavorite
c:method.description: Move the Blinds or Shade to a pre-programmed FAVORITE position.
